# System Ownership Map

For finance and operations teams. Fill in when you have 15 minutes. Spot gaps to tighten.

---

## Critical systems

| System | Owner | Backup | Review freq | Last reviewed |
|--------|-------|--------|-------------|---------------|
| ERP / Finance | | | | |
| Payroll | | | | |
| AP / AR | | | | |
| Reporting / BI | | | | |
| CRM | | | | |
| HRIS | | | | |
| _________________ | | | | |
| _________________ | | | | |

---

## Gaps to address

- [ ] Any system with no owner?
- [ ] Any system with no backup?
- [ ] Any system with no review cadence?
- [ ] Any system not reviewed in 6+ months?

---

## If you spot gaps

1. Assign owner and backup.
2. Set review cadence (monthly or quarterly minimum).
3. Schedule next review date.
4. Document runbook for outages or exceptions.
